title: Fish Tacos With Lime Sauce
directions: 1. Rinse fish and pat dry. Cut into 1 inch pieces
2. For lime sauce juice two of the limes into a bowl. Stir mayonnaise and chili powder into juice. Remove 1/3 cup sauce and toss fish in it.

3. In large skillet heat 2 tablespoons oil over medium heat. In shallow dish combine flour and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Working with a third of the fish at a time, toss into flour mixture and add to hot oil. Cook 2 to 4 min. or until fish flakes, turning to brown evenly and adding additional oil as needed. Drain on paper towels
4. Wrap tortillas in paper towels heat in microwave 30 seconds. Top tortillas with fish, cabbage, carrots and jalapeno drizzle with lime sauce. Garnish with lime wedges.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh tilapia or catfish fillets
2 small carrots, peeled and shredded (1/2 cup)
1 jalapeÃ±o or Serrano pepper, thinly sliced
